args:
Given this political fundraising email, respond with the name of the committee in the disclaimer that begins with Paid for by but does not include Paid for by, the committee address or the treasurer name. If no committee is present, return "None". Do not include any other text, no yapping.
name: Donald Trump Jr.
email: info@itsourgreatamerica.com
subject: We’re down to the wire
body: Bernie Moreno for US Senate Time is running out. That’s why I am campaigningwith Bernie Moreno in Ohio. Peter – Don Jr. here. I am on the campaign trailwith Bernie Moreno in Ohio. I know you’re getting so many emails,but will youtake less than 30 seconds to watch this video I recorded just for you?Thanks, Don Jr. WATCH NOW » Paid for by Bernie Moreno for Senate Don't wantto receive any more of our emails? We hate to see you go: unsubscribe .
